statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests
SELECT request_id, room_id, request_date FROM maintenance_requests WHERE facility_id = 5
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE room_id = 10 ORDER BY request_date DESC
SELECT request_id, request_details FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_id = 3
SELECT room_id, facility_id, COUNT(request_id) AS total_requests FROM maintenance_requests GROUP BY room_id, facility_id
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC, request_id ASC
SELECT room_id, facility_id, request_details FROM maintenance_requests WHERE facility_id = 5 ORDER BY room_id ASC
SELECT request_id, room_id, request_date FROM maintenance_requests WHERE room_id = 3 ORDER BY request_date DESC
SELECT facility_id, COUNT(request_id) AS total_requests FROM maintenance_requests GROUP BY facility_id HAVING COUNT(request_id) > 2
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE room_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND facility_id IN (2, 4) ORDER BY facility_id DESC, request_date ASC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE room_id = 101;
SELECT request_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_requests WHERE facility_id = 201 ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT room_id, COUNT(request_id) AS num_requests FROM maintenance_requests GROUP BY room_id ORDER BY num_requests DESC;
SELECT request_id, request_date FROM maintenance_requests WHERE maintenance_type = 'Plumbing' AND facility_id = 301;
SELECT schedule_id, technician_id, schedule_date, status FROM repair_schedule WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE facility_id = 1 AND request_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT request_id, room_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_requests WHERE facility_id = 2 ORDER BY request_id ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, technician_id, schedule_date FROM repair_schedule WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT request_id, maintenance_type, request_date FROM maintenance_requests WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%plumbing%' AND room_id = 101 ORDER BY request_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM repair_schedule WHERE technician_id = 5 AND status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests;
SELECT request_id, description, requested_on FROM maintenance_requests WHERE room_id = 101;
SELECT room_name, location, capacity FROM rooms WHERE capacity >= 50 ORDER BY room_name ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests ORDER BY requested_on DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE facility_id = 1 ORDER BY requested_on DESC
SELECT description, requested_on FROM maintenance_requests WHERE room_id = 5 ORDER BY requested_on ASC
SELECT room_id, facility_id, description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_id = 3
SELECT room_name, capacity, location FROM rooms ORDER BY room_id
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM facilities WHERE facility_id = 2
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests;
SELECT room_id, facility_id FROM maintenance_requests WHERE status = 'PENDING';
SELECT room_id, room_name, capacity FROM rooms ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT request_id, schedule_date FROM repair_schedule WHERE status = 'IN PROGRESS';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM rooms WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE facility_id = 2;
SELECT r.room_name, f.facility_name FROM rooms r JOIN facilities f ON r.room_id = f.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM repair_schedule WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests;
SELECT request_id, request_date, room_id, facility_id FROM maintenance_requests WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT room_id, capacity, location FROM rooms ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type, location FROM facilities WHERE facility_type = 'Office';
SELECT repair_id, facility_id, room_id, schedule_date FROM repair_schedule WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT room_id, room_name, capacity FROM rooms ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT facility_name, facility_type, location FROM facilities WHERE location = 'Building A'
SELECT request_id, request_date, request_description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE facility_id = 101
SELECT repair_id, schedule_date, status FROM repair_schedule WHERE facility_id = 201 ORDER BY schedule_date
